snippet: In her New York showroom the other day, the superstylist/designer Rachel Zoe talked about her fall collection, which will be shown today, and the gossip that trails her wherever she goes.
abstract: In her New York showroom the other day, the superstylist/designer Rachel Zoe talked about her fall collection, which will be shown today, and the gossip that trails her wherever she goes.
lead_paragraph: In her New York showroom the other day, the superstylist/designer Rachel Zoe talked about her fall collection, which will be shown on Saturday; life with her animated 10-month-old, Skyler, who accompanies her on the road; and the gossip that trails her wherever she goes.

headline.main: Rachel Zoe: Readying for the Runway
